name: The Rewind Spy
description:
IMPORTANT: THE MAC BUILD IS VERY LAGGY, SO IF YOU HAVE A PC, PLEASE DOWNLOAD THAT ONE.

Overview

The Rewind Spy is a 3D platformer game where you take the place of a secret agent infiltrating the enemy base. You are equipped with a special rewind device that warps you back in time whenever you are about to be harmed. Shoot enemies, escape traps, and warp through time to complete your mission!

Controls

A or D to move, SPACE or W to jump, CLICK to shoot, and use P to access a menu.

Pixel X Games: Discord Website YouTube
